Class HibernateDAO<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ftm.iamcore.services.dao.impl.HibernateDAO<T>

    T - any class, eg. Identity
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DAO<T>, java.io.Serializable

extends java.lang.Object
implements DAO<T>, java.io.Serializable
